dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, travel routes, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Features a decorative cartouche and illustration of a compass rose.
Inset map: Le passage du peuple saint par les deserts de l'Arabie.
Appears in Fer's Atlas curieux. Paris, 1705.
